titles.title: To extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on monocarboxylic fatty acids derived from palm oil.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 4/25/2012--Introduced. Reduces and extends the duty on monocarboxylic fatty acids derived from palm oil.
